import torch


def algorithm(
    Q: torch.Tensor, 
    K: torch.Tensor, 
    V: torch.Tensor
) -> torch.Tensor:
    '''
    args:
        Q: torch.Tensor of shape (batch_size, input_len, d_K)
        K: torch.Tensor of shape (batch_size, output_len, d_K)
        V: torch.Tensor of shape (batch_size, output_len, d_V)

    return:
        output: torch.Tensor of shape (batch_size, input_len, d_V)
    '''
    print(f'Q, K, V shapes: {Q.shape} {K.shape} {V.shape}')
    scores = torch.matmul(Q, K.transpose(-2, -1))
    output = torch.matmul(scores, V.transpose(-2, -1))
    return output

def algorithm(
    Q: torch.Tensor, 
    K: torch.Tensor, 
    V: torch.Tensor
) -> torch.Tensor:
    '''
    args:
        Q: torch.Tensor of shape (batch_size, input_len, d_K)
        K: torch.Tensor of shape (batch_size, output_len, d_K)
        V: torch.Tensor of shape (batch_size, output_len, d_V)

    return:
        output: torch.Tensor of shape (batch_size, input_len, d_V)
    '''
    print(f'Q, K, V shapes: {Q.shape} {K.shape} {V.shape}')
    scores = torch.matmul(Q, K.transpose(-2, -1))
    output = torch.matmul(scores, V.transpose(-2, -1))
    return output
